snippet: American Airlines said that improperly installed clamps had caused seats to come loose on some of its planes and that it was expanding an inspection to cover dozens of jets.
abstract: American Airlines says improperly installed clamps caused seats to come loose on some of its planes and that it is expanding an inspection to cover dozens of jets.
lead_paragraph: American Airlines said that improperly installed clamps had caused seats to come loose on some of its planes and that it was expanding an inspection to cover dozens of jets.

headline.main: Texas: Airline Faults Clamp Installation in Loose Seats
headline.print_headline: Texas: Airline Faults Clamp Installation In Loose Seats
